t: Shipping: When reusing an Amazon box, do I need to cross out the markings? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 23): All barcodes need to be covered or “destroyed”….that is either with a marker or heat (most labels are printed on laser paper…it turns black with some heat). If you have some semi transparent paper, put one or two additional layers to cover.
